speaker: PersonalFemale
text: Good morning. You look a little better today.

speaker: Male
text: Do I? Honestly, it still feels like I’m half dreaming.

speaker: PersonalFemale
text: You don’t have to understand everything right now. Just focus on what’s in front of you.

speaker: Female
text: Based on your vitals, recovery is progressing well. You’re more stable than yesterday.

speaker: Male
text: But there’s barely any pain. I was injured… wasn’t I?

speaker: Female
text: It wasn’t just treatment. We also accelerated cellular regeneration.

speaker: Male
text: Regeneration… was it really that serious?

speaker: Female
text: Yes. That’s why you’re here now. We reached you just in time.
